PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00512011-02-03,  ,  HC,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectChildren's Sleepwear Regulations
PrecisCHILDREN'S SLEEPWEAR REGULATIONS - The Hazardous Products (Children’s Sleepwear) Regulations will be repealed and replaced by the Children’s Sleepwear Regulations. The Regulations include the requirements of the repealed Regulations and also Item 5 of Part I of Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act in order to continue regulating all flammability requirements for children’s sleepwear under the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act, which comes into force on June 20, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0015 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
